content: these patterns are free patterns on my website https //www windingroadcrochet com/fall-crochet-centerpiece-pattern/ or you can purchase the pdf pattern above to have a neat clean printer-friendly large font ad-free version of the pattern the pattern is written in english using us terms pattern level easy this pattern uses the chain half_double_crochet single_crochet working in the back loops only slip_stitch single_crochet materials needed worsted weight yarn size 4 5 mm crochet hook yarn needle and scissors polyfil faux flowers and leaves glue optional this listing is for a pdf pattern instant download not a finished product please make sure to download adobe reader at www adobe com if you do not already have it on your computer all rights reserved copyright ©2021 winding road crochet purchaser is not allowed to copy sell or reproduce this pattern in any way because this is a digital product there will be no refunds after purchase
